thread.section_title: RG Riley Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RG Riley | www.rgriley.com
thread.title: Lil

author: Lil
title: Lil
text: I was looking for decent, inexpensive t-shirts for weaving project. Stumbled upon this site. I ordered a box of "third" rate shirts as they didn't need to be perfect. I was surprised at how high quality the shirts were at this supposedly low ranking. Quite wearable but I'm using them otherwise. Delivery was prompt. I thought shipping was a bit pricey, but when I realized how heavy 72 shirts are, the rate made more sense. I will definitely shop with this vendor again.
